RangerLevel1Spells.Name: Alarm
RangerLevel1Spells.Description: You set an alarm against unwanted intrusion. Choose a door, a window, or an area within range.

RangerLevel1Spells.Name: Animal Friendship
RangerLevel1Spells.Description: This spell lets you convince a beast that you mean it no harm.

RangerLevel1Spells.Name: Cure Wounds
RangerLevel1Spells.Description: A creature you touch regains a number of hit points equal to 1d8 + your spellcasting ability modifier.

RangerLevel1Spells.Name: Detect Magic
RangerLevel1Spells.Description: For the duration, you sense the presence of magic within 30 feet of you.

RangerLevel1Spells.Name: Detect Poison and Disease
RangerLevel1Spells.Description: For the duration, you can sense the presence and location of poisons, poisonous creatures, and diseases within 30 feet of you.

RangerLevel1Spells.Name: Entangle
RangerLevel1Spells.Description: Grasping weeds and vines sprout from the ground in a 20-foot square starting from a point within range.

RangerLevel1Spells.Name: Goodberry
RangerLevel1Spells.Description: Up to ten berries appear in your hand and are infused with magic for the duration.

RangerLevel1Spells.Name: Hunter's Mark
RangerLevel1Spells.Description: Choose a creature you can see within range and mystically mark it as your quarry.
